body: This spell functions as suffocation except as noted above. Note that the duration of this spell is much longer, forcing those suffering from the effect to make far more Fortitude saves to stave off eventual suffocation.
level_text: Arcanist: 9; Elementalist Wizard: 9; Sorcerer: 9; Witch: 9; Wizard: 9

effects.text: one living creature/2 levels (no two of which may be more than 30 feet apart)
effects.name: Target

components.text: a vial containing a bit of the caster's breath

component_text: V, S, M (a vial containing a bit of the caster's breath)
name: Suffocation, Mass
